Levels.Title: Belts & Extractors
Levels.Description: Allows to extract and transport shapes.

Levels.Title: Half Cutter
Levels.Description: Allows to cut a shapes in two halves, but returns only one side of the shape.

Levels.Title: Rotator
Levels.Description: Allows to rotate shapes clockwise by 90 degrees.

Levels.Title: Halves Swapper
Levels.Description: Allows to swap two halves of two shapes.

Levels.Title: Blueprints
Levels.Description: Allows to copy/paste parts of your factory.

Levels.Title: Stacker
Levels.Description: Unlocks the stacker, allowing to combine/staple shapes.

Levels.Title: Platform Building
Levels.Description: Allows placing new space station platforms.

Levels.Title: Space Tunnels
Levels.Description: Allows to transport shapes over long distances.

Levels.Title: Fluids & Painting
Levels.Description: Allows painting shapes. Hint: Make use of the blueprint functionality you just unlocked!

Levels.Title: Fluid Packing
Levels.Description: Allows to transport colors between space stations.

Levels.Title: Trains
Levels.Description: Unlocks trains. They are not working yet, but that won't stop you from progressing.

Levels.Title: Pin Pusher
Levels.Description: Allows to create shapes with floating layers by supporting them with pins.

Levels.Title: Fluid Trains
Levels.Description: Allows to transport fluids via trains. Not working yet.

Levels.Title: Wires
Levels.Description: Placeholder upgrade, will give you nothing for now.

Levels.Title: Infinite Upgrades
Levels.Description: Placeholder upgrade, will give you nothing for now. The last upgrade.

Nodes.Title: 2-Way Splitter
Nodes.Description: Allows splitting a belt. Drag over an existing belt to create a splitter.

Nodes.Title: 2-Way Merger
Nodes.Description: Allows merging belts. Place one belt onto another to create a merger.

Nodes.Title: 3-Way Splitter
Nodes.Description: Placeholder upgrade, will give you nothing for now.

Nodes.Title: 3-Way Merger
Nodes.Description: Merges 3 belts.

Nodes.Title: T-Shape Splitter
Nodes.Description: Splits the outputs to left and right instead of forward and side.

Nodes.Title: T-Shape Merger
Nodes.Description: Merges 2 belts, from left and right instead of backward and side.

Nodes.Title: Multi-Layer Splitter
Nodes.Description: Placeholder upgrade, will give you nothing for now.

Nodes.Title: Multi-Layer Merger
Nodes.Description: Placeholder upgrade, will give you nothing for now.

Nodes.Title: 2-Layer Lifts
Nodes.Description: Placeholder upgrade, will give you nothing for now.

Nodes.Title: Splitter/Merger Priorities
Nodes.Description: Placeholder upgrade, will give you nothing for now.

Upgrades.Title: Belt Speed 1
Upgrades.Description: Increases the speed of belts, rotators, splitters, mergers, catapults and belt lifts.

Upgrades.Title: Belt Speed 2
Upgrades.Description: Increases the speed of belts, rotators, splitters, mergers, catapults and belt lifts.

Upgrades.Title: Belt Speed 3
Upgrades.Description: Increases the speed of belts, rotators, splitters, mergers, catapults and belt lifts.

Upgrades.Title: Belt Speed 4
Upgrades.Description: Increases the speed of belts, rotators, splitters, mergers, catapults and belt lifts.

Upgrades.Title: Extractor Speed 1
Upgrades.Description: Increases the extraction speed.

Upgrades.Title: Extractor Speed 2
Upgrades.Description: Increases the extraction speed.

Upgrades.Title: Extractor Speed 3
Upgrades.Description: Increases the extraction speed.

Upgrades.Title: Extractor Speed 4
Upgrades.Description: Increases the extraction speed.

Upgrades.Title: HUB Input Size 1
Upgrades.Description: Increases the size of the HUB to allow for more inputs.

Upgrades.Title: HUB Input Size 2
Upgrades.Description: Increases the size of the HUB to allow for more inputs.

Upgrades.Title: HUB Input Size 3
Upgrades.Description: Increases the size of the HUB to allow for more inputs.

Nodes.Title: Full Cutter
Nodes.Description: Allows to cut shapes and outputs both halves.

Nodes.Title: Trash
Nodes.Description: Allows you to destroy no longer needed shapes. Can only be placed on the lowest layer.

Nodes.Title: CCW Rotator
Nodes.Description: Allows rotating a shape counter-clockwise.

Nodes.Title: Mirrored Full Cutter
Nodes.Description: NOT IMPLEMENTED. Mirrored variant of the full cutter, toggle with F

Nodes.Title: 180 Rotator
Nodes.Description: Allows rotating a shape by 180 degrees.

Upgrades.Title: Cutting Speed 1
Upgrades.Description: Increases the cutting, rotating, swapping and pin pushing speed.

Upgrades.Title: Cutting Speed 2
Upgrades.Description: Increases the cutting, rotating, swapping and pin pushing speed.

Upgrades.Title: Cutting Speed 3
Upgrades.Description: Increases the cutting, rotating, swapping and pin pushing speed.

Upgrades.Title: Cutting Speed 4
Upgrades.Description: Increases the cutting, rotating, swapping and pin pushing speed.

Upgrades.Title: Stacking Speed 1
Upgrades.Description: Increases the stacking speed.

Upgrades.Title: Stacking Speed 2
Upgrades.Description: Increases the stacking speed.

Upgrades.Title: Stacking Speed 3
Upgrades.Description: Increases the stacking speed.

Upgrades.Title: Stacking Speed 4
Upgrades.Description: Increases the stacking speed.

Nodes.Title: Platform Layouts 1
Nodes.Description: Unlocks new space station layouts.

Nodes.Title: Platform Layouts 2
Nodes.Description: Unlocks new space station layouts.

Nodes.Title: Platform Layouts 3
Nodes.Description: Unlocks new space station layouts.

Nodes.Title: Platform Layouts 4

Nodes.Title: Fluid Tank
Nodes.Description: Allows to store fluids.

Nodes.Title: Mirrored Topmost Painter
Nodes.Description: Placeholder upgrade, will give you nothing for now.

Nodes.Title: Full Painter
Nodes.Description: Placeholder upgrade, will give you nothing for now.

Nodes.Title: Pipe Junction/Cross
Nodes.Description: Unlocks 3-way/4-way pipe junctions.

Nodes.Title: Pipe Up/Down T2
Nodes.Description: Placeholder upgrade, will give you nothing for now.

Upgrades.Title: Pump & Packing Speed 1
Upgrades.Description: Increases the speed of the Fluid Pump, Fluid Filler, Fluid Drainer and Hydraulic Press.

Upgrades.Title: Pump & Packing Speed 2
Upgrades.Description: Increases the speed of the Fluid Pump, Fluid Filler, Fluid Drainer and Hydraulic Press.

Upgrades.Title: Pump & Packing Speed 3
Upgrades.Description: Increases the speed of the Fluid Pump, Fluid Filler, Fluid Drainer and Hydraulic Press.

Upgrades.Title: Painting Speed 1
Upgrades.Description: Increases the speed of the painter.

Upgrades.Title: Painting Speed 2
Upgrades.Description: Increases the speed of the painter.

Upgrades.Title: Painting Speed 3
Upgrades.Description: Increases the speed of the painter.

Upgrades.Title: Mixing Speed 1
Upgrades.Description: Increases the speed of the color mixer.

Nodes.Title: Decorative Label
Nodes.Description: Allows placing decorative labels.

Nodes.Title: Belt Reader
Nodes.Description: Allows to measure the belt speed and display it prominently.
